text: Elizabeth Berkley (born July 28, 1972, in Farmington Hills, Michigan) is an American movie and television actress. She is best known for her role in Saved by the Bell. She also acted in the 1995 erotic drama Showgirls, which garnered controversy due to its intense sexuality. Most of her movies are independent movies. Berkley is Jewish. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Michigan Category:American movie actors Category:1972 births Category:People from Farmington Hills, Michigan Category:American Jews Category:Living people
title: Elizabeth Berkley
